Never mind that you're too dumb for STEM or self governqnce, your cultural practices too savage, your gods barbaric....and other colonial era philosophies that defined the mental breakdown of an entire race for geberations to come.

In addition to all that, a black woman can also be expected to deal with a constant barrage of implied and explicit commentary that suggests her skin is too dark, her lips too full, her bum too fat (that is until collagenized lips à la Jolie and  filled glutes à la Kardashian turned "fat" into "phat".
